name: CMPedometerData
desc: Information about the distance traveled by a user on foot.

items.name: var startDate: Date
items.desc: The start time for the pedometer data.

items.name: var endDate: Date
items.desc: The end time for the pedometer data.

items.name: var numberOfSteps: NSNumber
items.desc: The number of steps taken by the user.

items.name: var distance: NSNumber?
items.desc: The estimated distance (in meters) traveled by the user.

items.name: var averageActivePace: NSNumber?
items.desc: The average pace of the user, measured in seconds per meter.

items.name: var currentPace: NSNumber?
items.desc: The current pace of the user, measured in seconds per meter.

items.name: var currentCadence: NSNumber?
items.desc: The rate at which steps are taken, measured in steps per second.

items.name: var floorsAscended: NSNumber?
items.desc: The approximate number of floors ascended by walking.

items.name: var floorsDescended: NSNumber?
items.desc: The approximate number of floors descended by walking.
